Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: aynsley howard
Reviews.Content: awesome camera, the wire was short for an expedition so I rigged to make it to the front. Excellent camera and arrived quick, Installation may require drilling thru metal and all.

Reviews.Title: Keeping my fingers crosses
Reviews.Author: E. Allegretti
Reviews.Content: Night vision appears completely washed out in the rain or snow. Dry daytime picture is great. I bought this to replace a cheaper version (same brand) which lasted 3 months on my plow truck before it showed "no video signal" on my ogm1 head unit, spent 2 hours redoing wiring and cables to determine the camera broke. Ugh. This one is the same build quality as the $15 one I'm hoping it will last a couple years. The RCA cable is not long enough for a crew cab longbed hd3500 I needed to buy a 6' extension cable at radio shack for $8 but that's not taotronics fault. Installation was simple.

Reviews.Title: Good to use, but I would rather get a better one.
Reviews.Author: Peter Gao
Reviews.Content: I bought this a year ago, and got it installed by expert along with the navigation unit INE-S920HD. When the guy installed it, he said the view angle sucks. I had no idea what is GOOD, the only thing I care was I got a rear view. Until recently I found the viedeo of alpine HCE-C157D, which has 190 degree horizontal and 167 degree vertical angles, I am amazed. So I measure the real view angle of this camera even though I am not professional, the result scared me, its only less than 100 degree both horizontal and vertical, far less then it said. I know the alpine one is 170 bucks, more than three times than this one, but, comparing to the car value, navigation unit, and the most important thing, safty, its worthy.PRO1, Good quality frame with anti-theft scaws.2, It does have night view under IR,comparing to some the 170 bucks one, it seems better.3, Water proof for sure, I use high pressure hose aim at it for a few minuses from different angle, no water inside at all.4, Cheap for a rear view camera and a aluminum frame.CON,1,Really bad view angle, its impossible to use to backup out of a parking place because the only thing you can see is whats behind you, maybe a little bit more area beside it.2,Those guidelines are useless, at less to me, would be better if it's optional, like some other cameras do.If you really really dont care about the view angle, buy it. Otherwise, go with some better ones, your and your car's safety are more expensive.I will update my review after installing the HCE-C157D.

Reviews.Title: Very high quality product.
Reviews.Author: Troy Hester
Reviews.Content: One piece construction makes the difference between an add on, and built in look. The only thing missing are the correct bolts to fit into the octagonal mounting holes. 6mm bolts and nuts available at a hardware store. Painted black.

Reviews.Title: Love it by day hate it at night
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Everything about this camera is awesome but the night vision feature  it's not clear enough but besides that it's great

Reviews.Title: Very nice, subtle
Reviews.Author: The Internet
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good camera, I am able to see clearly at night. The image quality could be better, and it is strange to use during the daytime since the IR sensitivity causes green trees to show up pink.

Reviews.Title: Works pretty well, great for the money!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This really takes the stress out of hooking up my travel trailer.  For some reason the Wife and I would always have a communication break down, and I would end up finally just doing it myself, after some "discussion".  With this camera hooked up to my Edge Insight on my F250 Powerstroke, I can back right up to the tongue, and all my wife has to do is tell me how far I need to go.  She does this to the camera, not to my mirrors.  Works well.  The only gig that I can give it is that it will occasionally go out while I am backing up.  I do not know if this is from the camera or my install, but it does go out.  I go back to park and back to reverse and it comes back on.  Not a huge deal, but an annoyance.  For the money, its well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Michael Robinson
Reviews.Content: Great picture and night vision. Easy install and setup. Has made it through some weather here too. would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Terry A. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I bought  this to replace a cheaper one that I had ordered.  It works really well and the picture is very clear.  I already had wired my vehicle for the previous camera, so installation was really simple.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Justin Hurley
Reviews.Content: Camera provides good picture and guidelines are helpful. Mine is mounted pretty low on my car so I could still hit things if I wasn't paying good attention but is helpful when pulling straight back into a space or driveway. The actually camera and LED's are kinda bulky and I'm afraid someone will be tempted to steal it. I recommend using Torx or hex bolts to secure it to help thwart a potentially easy theft.

Reviews.Title: More Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: Crimsonsunrise
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed with the performance of this backup camera. The low light feature is nice when backing up in the dark. It's unobtrusive and inconspicuous.

Reviews.Title: A little pricey, but you can see at night!
Reviews.Author: B. C.
Reviews.Content: This is my third backup camera and this one is great. You can actually see at night with this thing. Added bonus is that it looks like it came stock on the vehicle.

Reviews.Title: Well built
Reviews.Author: Greg G.
Reviews.Content: The build quality is great (all metal) and it fits perfectly. Camera can also be tilted up down by accessing two screws that lock it in place.

Reviews.Title: Rear view camera
Reviews.Author: KEVIN H KIM
Reviews.Content: Installed to my Nissan Titan truck, and it Works great.  A good value.  Love it and would recommend to friend.

Reviews.Title: nice item
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: this item does not come with the monitor you need to buy it seperately and can be a bit confusing on which one works with the license plate unit. other than that it looks good and it does work for the price.

Reviews.Title: This is great for cars that don't come with rear cameras
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: Specially if you combine it with Abco Tech 4.3 Inch TFT Car Auto LCD Screen Rear Monitor View Rearview this thing rocks. Let me say first though that if you're not electrically and mechanically inclined and don't have a good set of tools and understanding of car's electrical systems you will hate the install... But if you're up for it it's not bad. I had to drill a hole in the car's body to pass the cables (because I didn't want any cables to show) although you don't need to and combines with the aftermarket rearview mirror the pair works great. I did not hook it up to the backup light circuit as I primarily wanted it to "see" my trailer as I drive to make sure the cargo is OK or to back up into the hitch or drive in reverse with it without a helper. So I hooked it using a manual "push button switch" I located on the dash. I love the look of it and the camera has the "green-yellow-red- and alignment" bars superimposed in the image so my camera shows like it came from factory. Would be buying a seconds set for the wife's car soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandan
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera with good picture both day and night works very well and very easy to install.  Good field of view.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Mike Olson
Reviews.Content: Its sturdy frame and sleek looks is what interested me. The camara looks fine, but the Nightvision seems to get interference in the signal from the Head unit. Don't know whose faul but its pretty minor. Also i had to drill a hole through my license plate and bumper to run the wire without pinching it at the plate. Does as advertised at least.

Reviews.Title: Back up camera and monitor
Reviews.Author: Thorbjorn Finnbogason
Reviews.Content: I had it installed by a professional, and it's working great. The color is a little off, but I don't know if it's the camera, or the monitor. But that does not matter that much, and I'm happy with this camera setup.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the piece
Reviews.Author: J. Benjamin "JB"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product for the price,  Excellent visibility day and night,  easy to install, would buy again.  User comments convenience me to buy it.

Reviews.Title: license plate camera
Reviews.Author: Ray c
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a back up camera for my wifes jeep because she always says she can't see things behind her. I didn't want a camera that looked like an after thought, oddly hanging/attatched to the trunk. I came across this license plate camera and after reading the specs, decided to give it a try. It has a good build, very sturdy, no cheap thin plastic. At a glance it looks like it's just a tag frame.The picture quality is good and i just purchased another for my car. If you have a good head unit, you can adjust the colors on your screen.You can't beat this deal at $49.99!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: hearthstone
Reviews.Content: This is a really good product for the price.  Sure, picture quality does not compete with a high definition TV, but it sure beats not having any view at all when backing up.  Installation was simple, and the green, yellow, and red lines sure helps when you need to back up as close as possible to something like parallel parking.  The camera works great in the dark too!

Reviews.Title: It works, but image is not that good compared to other inexpensive aftermarket systems I've seen
Reviews.Author: Patrick R. McGuirk
Reviews.Content: I love the ability to have a backup camera in my car now.  This was pretty easy to install and adjust.  Only real problem is the image quality is rather poor.  Based on previous reviews I expected a clearer image.  But since I had nothing before this, I can't complain too much I guess!?!?

Reviews.Title: I don't know how I ever lived without one of these.
Reviews.Author: S. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use with my F150, which has a shell on the bed and so it's almost impossible to see out the back when reversing.  I don't know how I ever lived without one of these.  Installation was relatively simple.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a very solid product.
Reviews.Author: Alexander V. Smirnov
Reviews.Content: Used this with my Asteroid. I must admit - the quality of the picture is good. The frame is very solid. I can not speculate on how long will it work, but it is a good addition for now.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: High-Tech Redneck
Reviews.Content: Good, sturdy camera and plate frame.  Vertical adjustment is a great feature and works well.  Zero issues in four months of ownership.  Good visibility day and night.

Reviews.Title: Lovely camera!
Reviews.Author: Jordan Cartwright
Reviews.Content: Amazing Camera! I've never had a Backup Camera before, but i am truly wow'ed by this! Fantastic image quality on my JVC touch screen Head Unit and the Night Vision is wonderful! Not washed out or grainy. 4 stars because the wires that came with it were too short to connect inside my Taurus X SUV (Plate on Hatch)

Reviews.Title: great frame
Reviews.Author: Leo Duclos
Reviews.Content: the quality is good, but the camera lens should be shaded from direct sunlight. When backing toward the sun it washes out too much.

Reviews.Title: very solid
Reviews.Author: JayB
Reviews.Content: Very solid, requires purchasing hex head bolts to secure to auto.  Good picture, no issues with rain or water blurring video.

Reviews.Title: Excelent rear view camera
Reviews.Author: Enrique Roca
Reviews.Content: Excelent rear view camera with clear image and easy installation. Works great with my Pioneer head unit AVH-X5500BHS. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Good camera / value overall
Reviews.Author: adam2s
Reviews.Content: The camera works well and license place frame simplifies installation.  I would have left five stars except the design has the camera wire coming out where the sharp edge of license plate meets the frame - can be taped, but that part could have been better.  Nice amount of up/down adjustability - I have it set so that my red line is approx 1 ft at my bumper level which is pretty nice.  Happy for now - hoping the unit lasts a while w/o problems.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: aaron walrod
Reviews.Content: great back up camera. the only reason i did not give it a 5 star ratting is due to the video cord was to short for my truck. i have a 2005 F250 and i had to re route the video line three different ways to try and get it to reach the license plate. other than that it is a great camera. i would recomened this product to any one who is looking for a back up camera

Reviews.Title: You should have it.
Reviews.Author: Doc
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. It works perfectly. A night vision also well. The quality of video very good. I recomend to buy it.

Reviews.Title: This is a AWSOME product, I give it 5-stars ;-)
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Bradley
Reviews.Content: I give this product 5-stars, it works very very well as described, The picture is clear and because the camera is mounted on the license plate it doesn't stand out.  This is a AWSOME product.

Reviews.Title: TaoTronics License Plate Backup Camera
Reviews.Author: Allen G
Reviews.Content: Looks high quality with very sturdy construction. Chinese to English instructions will give you a chuckle. Should hold up well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, but small installation annoyance
Reviews.Author: Bryan Rose
Reviews.Content: Feels super heavy duty and solid.  Clear image, even at night.  Looks great on a 7-inch portable GPS (I'm using Magellan RoadMate 1700LM).  The only annoyance was on installation...  the hole you need to drill into the body for the tiny cable needs to be at least 1/2" in order for the RCA connector to fit through.  A smaller hole would have been desirable, but not enough for me to cut and re-splice the cable.  The larger hole was kind of a pain to seal up.  Other than that small annoyance, it's a very high quality item.

Reviews.Title: Best back up camera!
Reviews.Author: BFREY18
Reviews.Content: I couldn't believe the quality of the image. I hooked this up to my keenwood excelon radio. Easy install, just plugged the aux course from the camera into my radio and ran a separate cord from the back up cord on the back of my radio and tied it into the back up light along with the power source for my camera. For the price I and 100% happy. It even has the colored grid on the camera which I measured to see distance but doesn't have a beeper notification to let you know when your getting close. Another cool thing was at night the camera goes from color to black and white and makes it so much easier to see at night.

Reviews.Title: Decent.
Reviews.Author: Swany
Reviews.Content: Pretty nice. Only two things I don't like, both design issues. There are holes in the top with allen screws for adjusting angle. Their location makes them perfect water and dirt collectors. Also, the hex shaped holes for bolts are too small. Image quality is nice, seems pretty sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Great Value Product
Reviews.Author: Nick Approved
Reviews.Content: I looked over a few other products and liked that this one consisted of a black metal frame and the camera was built in.  The device was fairly easy to install once I was able to run the wires to the head unit and the appropriate connection points. So far it seems like it's a great value for the money.  The image quality is great and the IR seems to illuminate rather well in the night hours.  Will see how it holds up through snow, but seems to handle rain without issue.

Reviews.Title: Best back up camera for the money
Reviews.Author: jbr23
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on the customer reviews primarily, and the affordable price.  I have had it installed on my truck for a few weeks now and I have been really happy with it.  I hooked it up to a pioneer deck and wired it to a switch so I can turn the camera on and off manually as I wanted to be able to have it on while plowing snow without the truck being in reverse.  The night vision is also good.  I would highly recommend this camera, solid construction and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Received quickly & is as advertised. Works very well.
Reviews.Author: Warren Edwards
Reviews.Content: I WOULD RATE IT AT 5 STARS IF THE WIRING INSTRUCTIONS HAD BEEN BETTER.THE WIRE COLORS AND PIN LOCATIONS GIVEN FOR INSTALLATION IN THE 2008 AVALON WERE VERY DIFFERENT FROM THOSE ACTUALLY IN THE CAR.  THUS, SOME EXTRA TIME REQUIRED TO MAKE THE PROPER CONNECTIONS WHICH LED TO FRUSTRATION.

Reviews.Title: would recommend
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A VERY GOOD PRODUCT VERY EASY TO INSTALL AND WORKS GREAT.  I RECEIVED THIS ITEM VERY QUICKLY. WOULD RECOMMEND AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: Boston Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new backup camera so I could replace my old one (a Boyo from 2008) so I could get better details, ir lights and guide lines. When I received the product, it looked very well made. The license plate bracket was metal and very well built and cables were high quality. However, when I hooked it up, the video camera was dead (should have tested before I did all the wiring!). Troubleshooting included direct connection to head unit and a monitor. My old camera worked with both of these units so I knew the camera was dead. The unit was getting power (IR lights worked in dark) but no video signal. If the camera would not have been DOA, it would have rated a  4 or 5. I would have given a 1 but for its quality I gave it a 2. I have returned it and when I get credit, I may order a new one to see if it was just bad luck. If I do and it works I will update my comments..

Reviews.Title: Very good camera!
Reviews.Author: Harry K
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how good the clarity was on this camera.  I mainly use it to hook up my trailer.  I can easily see my trailer ball and stop in time so all I have to do is lower the jack.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Dashae Mariano
Reviews.Content: i bought the 15$ license plate camera and it lasted til the first rain storm the taotronics camera has not given me any problems its a great product

Reviews.Title: back up camera initial rewiev
Reviews.Author: Sookram Ramsaroop
Reviews.Content: Camera picture quality is decent,grid lines are not accurate at all,lots of glare when raining from others headlights,night vision is decent,no hardware supplied to mount frame,only mounted a few weeks so don't have any feedback on reliability as of yet.

Reviews.Title: As advertized
Reviews.Author: erik hamilton
Reviews.Content: Easy install, just enough cable for a full size extended cab truck.  Picture quality is pretty good. The frame is quality.

Reviews.Title: Very good image, very useful!
Reviews.Author: Marshall Taylor
Reviews.Content: This has made backing up my 2005 Toyota Sienna much easier and less stressful.  It would earn five stars if I could pivot the camera vertically through, say, 90 degrees.  However, it is still an excellent device!  As others have mentioned, the frame is really nice cast aluminum with a clean paint job.  Mounting it was a cinch.  It has been running reliably since I bought it ~4 months ago.  FWIW, I park my car outside, so it's hit pretty hard by the elements.  This was a great purchase, especially for living in the big city (SF, CA).

Reviews.Title: IT ROCKS
Reviews.Author: mhg
Reviews.Content: Finally got it installed buy car audio  place where i live and i just love it great product for the price

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: Leslie Mayeux
Reviews.Content: As the person always having to direct the driver; this equipment is amazing!! Saves a lot of time and very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great width of view
Reviews.Author: Josh Holmes
Reviews.Content: Looks almost OEM and can see the ground a few inches behind my bumper. I wish it also had radar but as a camera, it's outstanding.

Reviews.Title: good for the cost
Reviews.Author: Kerry Adams
Reviews.Content: For the $ it is awesome. Wish it had a little better connections and cable quality.I like the quality of the build materials.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: J. Monroe "Fusion"
Reviews.Content: This works great on my car.  The night time LEDs make the image show up well when it is pitch black, This is definitely worth the money and was remarkably easy to install.  The green, yellow and red lines give a good reference of distance when backing up.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: David Biemer
Reviews.Content: I have installed this camera and frame on my 2006 Jeep Commander. I like the solid metal and it seems well built... Time will tell, but it does not look flimsy. I like that you can adjust the viewing angle of the camera to account for different vehicle heights. On the commander, the frame sits very close to the hatch handle and I will need to make a lowering bracket to get more space for fingers.All in all, it does not look cheap and took less that 1 hour to set up in my vehicle.Disclaimer... I already had a head unit which accepts a rear view camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Steven Ford
Reviews.Content: Not as good as factory units, but a great way to add-on to vehicle at a good price and easy hookup.

Reviews.Title: Colors and brightness leave something to be desired.
Reviews.Author: Slyder
Reviews.Content: Have this unit hooked up to a high end Video Pioneer Receiver, I have tried altering the appearance of the video in every way possible, but, it still seems a bit to dark to use well.  For a Camera that was supposed to be infrared capable, I'm not so sure thats true.

Reviews.Title: Great aftermarket reverse camera
Reviews.Author: AMP
Reviews.Content: Amazing value for the price (I bought mine on sale, admittedly).  I was so impressed with this unit that I installed a second one on a friend's car.  The camera is very clear and the angle is adjustable up and down.  The frame itself looks sharp, and is extremely sturdy.Installed on a 2006 Subaru WRX wagon by routing above the bumper frame and drilling through the rubber spare tire well drain plug, and in a 2009 Dodge Challenger by routing through the hidden trunk vents with zero cutting whatsoever.  Wiring/trim disassembly will take some guts if you are not used to doing stereos, but that's true of any camera install.  Feds a crystal clear video signal to both my Pioneer, and her Alpine video head units without issue.Only possible areas of improvement for the kit:-Perhaps include black screw caps/covers to blend in with frame; I bought a 3rd party locking screw kit that came with caps, and it looks great.-Lead wires for power and ground could stand to be longer, and thicker gauge.  Stripping and splicing were very delicate operations to make sure they didn't snap.Again, amazing value overall.  I'd recommend this again in heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: works great, really waterproof
Reviews.Author: M. Tucker "mtucker"
Reviews.Content: I bought this license plate/ backup camera based on others reviews of really being waterproof.  Some of the reviewers of the cheaper backup cameras complained about water getting in the lens.It bolted right on and works great.  I have only had it for a few weeks, but it has been through the car wash twice and there was no sign of moisture in the lens.The supplied composite video cable and reverse trigger wire were both plenty long to reach my radio (1st gen double cab Tacoma truck).  The license plate frame seems sturdy and strong.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: richard bailey
Reviews.Content: works great! pic is clear even after rain and dirt and sitting in the heat no probs. great back up cam

Reviews.Title: rearview camera
Reviews.Author: Robert A Hingle
Reviews.Content: this is a great rearview camera, I have used it for several months with no issues of water leakage, friends have bought the cheaper 15 dollar cameras and they all leak water into the camera rendering them useless, so far so good with this one

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jose Pinochet
Reviews.Content: Good resolution and perfect night visión. when used the camera i feel comfortable. I recommend it 100%, from chile!! !

Reviews.Title: TaoTronics rearview camera
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: Installed on a Ford F150 last summer. so far so good, used in sub freezing and +90 degree  weather. even on rainy day it still gives a clear picture with no fogging. night vision is good.Install is pretty straight forward, hook up power to your reverse lights and run video cable to back ofindash dvd receiver.  mounting hardware could be a little better

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: this is a very good product.  My wife has a fully loaded honda with  nav and back up camera and to be honest mines look better than hers.  very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Very useful.  Works great.
Reviews.Author: Nuknuk
Reviews.Content: I have the black version of this, it replaced my stock license plate that came with the car.  The frame is soid heavy metal frame.  It doesn't come with screws but you just use the screws on your old license plate and it fits perfectly.  My DMV plate only has two holes on top so I have the choice to drill the extra two holes or not.The camera is waterproof and has night vision.  It can be directed up and down if you want to see more of the ground or more of the horizon.  Once you are satisfied with the angle of view,  use the small Allen key (included in the box - taped on the foam cushion) to tighten it permanently.There is a very short manual which gives you the specs and short description of the product, not a lot on installation procedure as it vary from car to car. Professional installer is recommended.  Powering it up and connecting the camera is the easy part, the more challenging part is removing the panels of your car's trunk or lid and fishing the wires.  By the way, this is a wired camera as opposed to a wireless camera setup.  My radio installer is recommending a wired system as it is more reliable.Camera gives you zones (guide) on the bottom of your monitor.  The red zone which is closer to the bottom of the screen is about a foot away from my bumper so I know when I am about to bump.  The green zone is still about three to five feet away. The zones are very helpful indeed.  Night vision works pretty well too,  you can see enough not the hit objects in the dark.Overall, very satisfied with the performance and quality of this backup camera.Sample item provided by the distributor for evaluation review.

Reviews.Title: Very useful -  works great!
Reviews.Author: Nuknuk
Reviews.Content: This replaced my stock license plate that came with the car.  The frame is solid black heavy metal frame.  It doesn't come with screws but you just use the screws on your old license plate and it fits perfectly.  My DMV plate only has two holes on top so I have the choice to drill the extra two holes or not.The camera is waterproof and has night vision.  It can be directed up and down if you want to see more of the ground or more of the horizon.  Once you are satisfied with the angle of view,  use the small Allen key (included in the box - taped on the foam cushion) to tighten it permanently.There is a very short manual which gives you the specs and short description of the product, not a lot on installation procedure as it vary from car to car. Professional installer is recommended.  Powering it up and connecting the camera is the easy part, the more challenging part is removing the panels of your car's trunk or lid and fishing the wires. My radio installer is recommending a wired system as it is more reliable.Camera gives you zones (guide) on the bottom of your monitor.  The red zone which is closer to the bottom of the screen is about a foot away from my bumper so I know when I am about to bump.  The green zone is still about three to five feet away. The zones are very helpful indeed.  Night vision works pretty well too,  you can see enough not the hit objects in the dark.Overall, very satisfied with the performance and quality of this backup camera.Sample item provided by the distributor for evaluation review.

Reviews.Title: Camera installed on 2004 Pilot
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The price was very good for this camera.  Installation was not very difficult.  I had to remove side panels to run the video cable from my alpine in dash dvd to the rear lift gate.  The cable was long enough.  I had to splice into reverse lights wire to connect power wire.  The picture quality was good, not great, during daylight.  The night vision was excellent with limited lighting.  However, for the price, it was more than worth it.

Reviews.Title: Really nice-- totally does the job
Reviews.Author: Darin
Reviews.Content: Great job on a device that fits in with the truck.  I operate a service company, and purchased this so the techs who drive this truck could be safer.  It's been a week so far -- but geez, I want this on my own car.  Works really well.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars if power wires were better!
Reviews.Author: Michael Zarek
Reviews.Content: Good cam, well built, all metal.  Only gripe is that the power wires are a very small gauge and will not easily buddy clip to existing car wiring.  Had to splice a larger gauge wire to the end of them before I could make a good connection.  Other than that, good cam at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Well Constructed
Reviews.Author: Joseph D. Orndorff
Reviews.Content: Very nicely made camera and frame. Camera video quality is pretty good. Considering the price... I'm very pleased with the product overall.A couple of thinks I didn't like:1) The video cable was too short for my Crew Cab F150.2) Cables are very small gauge with small diameter jackets. You will need to be careful and provide strain relief as necessary.3) The cable can get pinched behind where the frame mounts to the car. I added some washers between the frame and my bumper so as not to squish my cables.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: dhamp
Reviews.Content: Worked as expected and is hardly noticeable.  The image on the head unit is as clear as my smartphone.  I wish the backup cam on my other car (factory) was this good.  Don't hesitate if you're on the fence.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: kimmarc723
Reviews.Content: Very nice license plate camera! I hooked it up with relative ease.  No instructions come with the camera, I had to figure out that you have to wire the the power cord to the left and right side backup lights for my 08 328i Coupe.  After that everything worked like a charm. Nice camera with a nice color view in the daytime and nightime view was very good with infrared.  I am totally happy with the camera.  Backup lines are very helpful when trying to back into tight spaces.  Definitely a good buy and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: BT "BT"
Reviews.Content: Product is awesome so far! Pretty easy install. Hardest part is finding a way to route the wires inside the car.Product came with sufficient RCA Video wire to fit a Ford Expedition. Even mounted monitor (bought separately) on windshield, on top of rear view mirror. Used the red remote wire that came pre-connected with the RCA cable as the power wire for both camera and monitor.  Spliced them to the rear reverse light. Worked like a charm! Hope it lasts...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: amazonuser
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product and easy to install.  This is my 2nd camera, first one bought a week ago and damaged the wire during installation.  It was purely my mistake, but learnt the process.  Please take your time to think through, before modifying anything in the product itself.

Reviews.Title: came up just a inch short.on the with of the view angle need a little bit wider
Reviews.Author: M. H. jones "TEAM(SOLO)"
Reviews.Content: The camera works well its nice and bright in dark areas the distence lines do help the actual closest line to your car or suv is like 5ft away from your bumper..over all its worth what you pay.i would do it again.thanx.bouncehousepartyrentalsdmv.com

Reviews.Title: best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: txbest1980
Reviews.Content: camera and mounting fits perfectly.  camera is extremely clear, even on a cheap head unit...definitely the best bang for your buck

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It works fine. I have no complaints. I have it connected to my Pioneer AVH-X3500BHS 2-DIN Multimedia DVD Receiver with 6.1 WVGA

Reviews.Title: Too cool!
Reviews.Author: Jesus
Reviews.Content: Installed this to work with my pioneer avh 5500 bus double din looks real nice. Very solid And nice camera

Reviews.Title: Best back up camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Van Balam
Reviews.Content: I've had a few back up cameras and this one is by far the best I've had. Installation was simple and the frame looks great on my truck. Very durable.

Reviews.Title: Great Backup Carmera
Reviews.Author: MSwale
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for 03 Toyota Celica -It works great the color looks good and it had done wonders while backing up to know I'm not going to hit something. However, when it rains it is useless - but at least it's waterproof to not break!

Reviews.Title: Solid Backup Camera- especially for the cost!
Reviews.Author: Travis Stetzel
Reviews.Content: Just had this installed and it has a nice picture, the green & yellow lines are helpful and the picture is even decent at night. Connected it to a Pioneer AVHP-4400BH and the picture is nice, I can even turn the camera on when driving! Cool, but a little disorienting. Would purchase this again. Good seller too- my initial order was out of stock and their was some initial confusion but the seller had good lines of communication, responded quickly and handled the situation well and left me, the customer, happy. Why spend $100+ on a backup camera when this is a great solution for  $50!

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: Patricia Belmont
Reviews.Content: Had a poor picture and the adjusting screws striped out very first time, it was hard to adjust.I wouldn't by again

Reviews.Title: Broken on arrival
Reviews.Author: Piper
Reviews.Content: The camera I received could not produce a useable image.  The picture was washed out and gray, with no color except the alignment overlay.  Screws that hold camera in position broke while diagnosing picture.

Reviews.Title: Differant opinion
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: Camera works good, color is good , installs easy. BUT the view is smaller than they say can't see ends of your bumper. This was the reason I paid this much but didn't get what I wanted or what was advertised

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Carl Bowman
Reviews.Content: This camera works exactly as expected. For the price, it's a great bargain. The colored lines superimposed on the display are handy. It is pretty light sensitive, even when my eyes are seeing that it's dusk and almost getting dark, the image looks almost like daylight. Even the camera's "night vision" is semi-decent with the IR LED's. Although the angles of the LED's themselves should be adjustable. They cast their light in a fairly narrow band. It would be nice to be able to adjust them to a specific need BUT, I'm still very satisfied with the results.Installation on pickups can be a challenge unless your a seasoned DIY'er. You bave to thread the cable along the frame up to the cab somewhere. Newer trucks don't provide nice places to thread the video feed cable through. You might need to drill a hole. I went through a plastic plug where a clutch peddle would have been on  the firewall AND the supplied cable isn't long enough for full sized trucks. You will have to extend it.

Reviews.Title: Trouble with Hookup to Rand McNally RVND 7720 GPS
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera works great but I had to order a "RCA female to 2.5mm video wire" from DieselBoss.com in order to hook it up to my Rand McNally RVND 7720 GPS.  It cost me another $15.00 to order and ship it.  It would have been nice had they included this item in the package.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Dom
Reviews.Content: UPDATE 2/28/14.After using this product for a few more weeks, the chrome/metal of the license plate frame and the camera's housing unit has these blotches which I am guessing is a result of the salt that they spread on the highways for snow/ice. I take my gf's car for a car wash routinely to prevent salt eating into her car's paint (and I would imagine this item too), but they are there! I tried rubbing them off with wet towels and windex, but did not improve much. Does not look great.I am not dropping to two stars because the camera is still very capable and works fine (see my earlier review). But I will drop it to 3 stars.=========================================Only had for a few weeks on my gf's car. Looks great so far. Gone through snow and a car wash without a problem. It does what it's supposed to to do -- give a fairly clear picture when I back up. It turns on quickly on her 2007 Acura TSX. Not a fan of the lines (green, green, yellow, red), but I am not going to take off a star for that since that's personal taste. I have no problems backing up at night; although I did adjust the settings on my navigation/GPS screen to make it more visible.

Reviews.Title: Nice Unit
Reviews.Author: Barry Creighton
Reviews.Content: This is a nice unit that after a month or so with rain and freezing weather seems to be holding up nicely.The positives:You can see in the dark and rain.Pretty decent view (about 170 degrees) panoramaThe negatives:The camera sticks out and is bulky enough on my 4 runner that it makes it difficult to squeeze my fingers between it and the door release.If you are backing up into a sunrise, it washes it out a tad, but you still can see.  This is a very minor gripe.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Ralph Wood
Reviews.Content: I bought this at Amazon. Shipped promptly. Upon receiving it I discovered the set screws for the swivel camera were missing. Contacted them and the sent the replacements quickly. Installed easily and working fine.

Reviews.Title: As good as you would expect for price, not better.
Reviews.Author: Deryl B
Reviews.Content: I actually got what I expected for the price, but not what I expected per the review and ratings. Installation was simple since all you have to mount is the license plate frame which the camera is attached. The wiring provided was not long enough for a pickup, so you will need an extension. But that was not much additional cost or effort. The frame and camera are sturdy material. Picture quality is average if not slightly below. Don't need HD quality to backup so really no reason to spend more.

Reviews.Title: excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Brice
Reviews.Content: update:This company has excellent customer service even after the sale.  I get disappointed these days when a company does not stand behind their products.  Fortunately there are businesses like this one which goes beyond what is expected.  I will look for more products from this seller.  Thank you.The company has sent a replacement.I hooked it up and it works but the resolution is terrible.  The picture has a washed out faded and near black and white appearance.  Hopefully I will be able to correct the issue by installing a shielded video cable.  As far as just being able to use it as a safety measure while backing up I suppose it is borderline acceptable.I have installed many cameras so I know a little about the subject.  I hope that I will be able to post an update saying that the problem has been corrected.  As of right now I am not too happy with the purchase. If I had paid half the price I might have expected this but that is not the case.Stay tuned.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Elton Pettaway
Reviews.Content: This product turned out to be better than I thought. It works great. I haven't had any problems and it has been through rain and snow storms. I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Marlins Fan
Reviews.Content: What a nice camera for $50. The installation was easy. The product description says to connect one wire to Positive, the other to Negative. The printed instructions says to connect the other to Ground.... I connected to Negative and worked great.Just find the reverse light bulb in the back of your car, and tap into those wires to power the unit.The RCA cable is long enough. I cut the head off so I could snake it thru the rubber between the rear cargo door of my 2007 FJ Cruiser and the main body, then I patched the head back in. The wires inside are very thin, but they are holding for now.The camera has nice clear picture both in day and night. The gridlines for me are worthless because I have this aimed down enough so I can see the edge of my bumper, so the gridliness are pointing into the pavement behind my truck. I didn't buy this camera to see 50 feet behind me, I bought to see right behind my car so I don't back into my kids!I bought these bolts to go along with it so nobody can steal this camera from my car:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00032KC2G/?tag=5336116720-20

Reviews.Title: Great back up camera
Reviews.Author: Cheeta-eh
Reviews.Content: I had mine installed 4 months ago in my 2006 Highlander and this thing works really well. I opted for Taotronics because of the price compared to Pioneer that would cost me $199. I took a gamble because I never heard of this product but so far I have no complains about it. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Tao Tronics Backup Camera
Reviews.Author: walleye
Reviews.Content: The camera has worked fine so far. The only thing I can say is the picture is not all that great it is good enough for backing up and stuff but it also could be me not setting up my setting right on my radio.  For the money you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: It works as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Al Del Vecchio "Al Flyer"
Reviews.Content: Very waterproof. I live in the northwest and it rains everyday. Never had a problem with water. Also, very easy installation.  Only cons would be that the video quality could be a little higher, and it is still hard to determine how close you are to an object.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: dmo
Reviews.Content: I installed this on my 2002 ford excursion and it works very well.  I like the gridlines in the video image that lets you know how close you are getting.  I drove it through a car wash and it had no problems with water getting in it.  I gave it 4 stars because I wish the wires were a little thicker gauge.  I wired the power wire to the reverse power wire located in my factory tow hitch.  It works really well with my pioneer appradio2.  Video automatically turns on when i put it in reverse.

Reviews.Title: REVERSE
Reviews.Author: Eric Grigsby
Reviews.Content: If you played UNO you know about REVERSE!If you upgrade the radio you don't have to upgrade the car!Reverse camera's are the easiest and coolest way to makeyour car brand new.Now the question is: to DVR or NOT DVR?

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: D. Hall "bgpicker"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to go with a Kenwood DDX371 2-din DVD player. Added to a 2005 Silverado Crew Cab. There was actually enough wiring to reach all the way to the indash unit, but not enough to extend if removing the unit, so I had to connect an additional length of wire to accomplish this (but less than 10" of wire). It's a CMOS camera lens so the view is not as clear as what I imagine a CCD lens would be. Construction is fairly sturdy and was easy to connect to rear lighting. I like the grid lines and I think it will be helpful when I'm hooking up my trailer to the hitch ball. Overall at this time I'm satisified, but I've only had the product for less than a month, so only time will tell. But for the present time I've given it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Shelle Belle
Reviews.Content: Bought for boyfriend's birthday and he is so happy with it. Works great and hooked right into his head unit on his stereo. Makes backing up so much more convenient.

Reviews.Title: Better than most but flickers and overpriced.
Reviews.Author: Pioneer
Reviews.Content: Connecting it to my screen was easy. I was expecting it to be of superior quality considering the price but it wasn't that impressive after all.The camera flickers a lot and that over shadows its decent sensor for colors during daytime. It's terrible during nighttime but again, almost all cameras are.The manufacturer should fix the flickering problem or lower their prices.

Reviews.Title: Built Well, does the job
Reviews.Author: Blake
Reviews.Content: This works pretty well, this is the only rear cam i have had so i cant compare quality. I will say that mine is constantly powered on and hasn't died yet. (it is winter though so in the hot summer it may not be able to handle it).I will update if it dies.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Woodrow W.
Reviews.Content: It was good while it worked I went through the car was twice and it has never worked again not worth the money

Reviews.Title: poor instructions
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: Tested camara to battery picture came on screen. Hooked up to back up lights and didn't work. Ran cable to hook up to battery still wont work.

Reviews.Title: Beware of license plate light location!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Rickard
Reviews.Content: I installed this product without a problem and it does work, but since my license plate light is directly above the camera, it causes severe glare at night making it pretty much unusable.

Reviews.Title: Much better than the $15 one it replaced.
Reviews.Author: C. Dissmore
Reviews.Content: Much better build quality. The $15 one I got here on Amazon worked okay at first, but had an issue with getting fogged from moisture from car washes. I see others have reported that as well. It just quit working completely one day about 11 months into ownership. Got this one to replace it. Really crisp, better picture, better night performance, quite a lot better build quality. No issues with fogging or leakage at car wash. Trusting it will last longer, but it's only been installed a month so time will tell on that.

Reviews.Title: Big camera module
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I thought the camera would be smaller... it is quite large and looks obviously aftermarket. Also, the viewing angle is only about 120 degrees or so. The night vision does work quite well, though, and installation is easy since it only has to mounted on your license plate.

Reviews.Title: Grid lines disappeared after a month!
Reviews.Author: B. Steineckert "B"
Reviews.Content: Was loving this little camera until the grid lines crapped out on me for no apparent reason.  One day, they were there, next day, gone (right about the time I was getting used to them).  I tried unplugging the car battery to "reset" it and no go.  It's connected to a pioneer AVH-X3500BHS.  I keep hoping they'll magically come back the way they magically disappeared...

Reviews.Title: Pioneer Avic-920BT rear camera addition
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: The unit was a relatively easy install onto a Lexus LS400. Once I determined how to unsnap moldings, the installation went well with one exception. The supplied wire that come with the unit, is at an unreasonable gauge to properly connect it mechanically.  I used a squeeze connector to join reverse gear lamp wire and the camera wire which I can only estimate is a 30/32 gauge wire (which is extremely smaller than the 24awg wire that came on the car) made this project unnecessarily difficult. My connections were intermittent because the wire is too small to make a proper connection. Nevertheless, once this obsticle was overcome, the unit provided an excellent view of the rear surroundings.  I am satisfied with its performance and rear view clarity.

Reviews.Title: Works great. Put it on my F150 helped me out backing up and hooking up to my trailer.Color is good also night vision is great.
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Works great. Put it on my F150 helped me out backing up and hooking up to my trailer.Color is good also night vision is great.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: I had this professionally put on my Jeep wrangler. However the installer told me that the product is a defective product and that I need to send it back and either get a different one or my money back. He then showed me how everything was getting power and showed me why he feels it is in the camera part of the product that is defective. The wires and lines all have power however the camera itself does not work, he told me that the wires I so thin inside the cameras that they sometimes malfunction. I am returning this item depending on how that goes and the new one I get if I change y feelings and experience with this product. right now I am highly unsatisfied. I had to pay the professional for the work even though the product I bought did not work. inside the instructions and the company that supplies this product made sure to add to get a professional to do this. so I paid for a product and I paid for a professional to tell me that this product does not work.

Reviews.Title: reverse camera
Reviews.Author: Lynda B.
Reviews.Content: Can't get it to work ,it gets power but doesn't come on. I've hooked DVD players before its three wires ,should work but doesn't

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Lindsey C Hollins
Reviews.Content: I like the design over the license plate, and it blends in with my vechile. Really don't like the cloudiness within the camera when in reverse. I have a nine inch radio display/faceplate.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: BoatSurgeon/Richard Kurthy
Reviews.Content: I received this camera and it dident work from the day I opened it up out of the package... I wouldent get this again

Reviews.Title: License plate camera
Reviews.Author: Byron S.
Reviews.Content: The trunk on the 2003 BMW has a release button in the handle and the camera is positioned right under the trunk release and is causing the camera to be used to lift the trunk which is not good for the product.

Reviews.Title: does not intergrate with 2000 ford
Reviews.Author: Fred Oven
Reviews.Content: Does not work with back-up mirror as stated.It comes with wrong ends cannot connect.I wish THE PEOPLE WHO WRITE THE DESCRIPTIONS would know something  about what they are writing about.

Reviews.Title: False advertising
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I will never give you my business again.  I purchased this only to find out items pictured were not included.  It should have been a holiday gift for someone and instead it was a waste of my time and money.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Carroll "truckerbabe"
Reviews.Content: was a gift but due to the info was misinforming. there is no monitor so this was really not a good buy

Reviews.Title: Chevy Sonic's mylink monitor does not support this backup camera
Reviews.Author: K. POON
Reviews.Content: I took this product to Best buy store to be installed, and was told that it can't connect to Mylink monitor in my Sonic, I just spoke to a tech rep at Chevy and according to him, my Sonic's mylink does not support backup camera display.

Reviews.Title: didn't include a needed part
Reviews.Author: MommyC
Reviews.Content: I wanted a back up camera on my 2013 Pathfinder that didn't come with it.  It's the back up camera but you ALSO NEEDsomething to see it on from inside the car.  This was misleading because I thought it included it.  Piece of junk sittingaround in my house. Traded in the Pathfinder with no bells and whistles for an Altima with a backup camera so I don'tneed it any more.  Junk.

Reviews.Title: Monitor not included!
Reviews.Author: Michael Dietz
Reviews.Content: Note that while many rear-view camera systems come with some kind of monitor, this one doesn't and must be purchased separately.
